            Center: This text is centered within the container.
        
        
            Right: This text is aligned to the right side of the container.
        
        
            Justify: This text is justified to fill the entire width of the container with even spacing.
        
        
            Start: This text uses logical start alignment.
        
        
            End: This text uses logical end alignment.
